description:
~~~ Top selling education app around the world! Over 5,000,000 downloads! ~~~
~~~ No.1 education app in the US, UK and worldwide. Selected as New & Noteworthy by Apple! ~~~
~~~ More than 200 Gorgeous and Exciting Coloring Pages ~~~

Your budding Picasso will LOVE the world famous, Paint Sparkle Draw app with new gorgeous graphics and fabulous features! Children’s favorite coloring book is now easier to use than ever! With 20+ vibrant crayon look-alike colors and a whimsical magic coloring tool, your little artist is guaranteed hours of fun. Paint Sparkles Draw includes more than ten, fun-filled categories of drawing pages to spark the creativity and imagination in your child. Check out the holiday and Christmas categories as well. Perfect for the holiday season! 

The world is your canvas! Now you can bring the real world in the app and draw on it too! Take a picture and draw on it or create a drawing then add it to the real world with the camera too! There’s no limits to what you can create with this app now, start from scratch or add your own touches to the world around you, it’s like magic at the touch of your fingers! 

Have you ever imagined shooting rockets filled with paint all over the place? Now you can in this app! Shake your device and little rockets will shoot off and splash paint of random colors all over your drawing! It’s super fun and the rockets are filled with all kinds of paint, so you will never get the same result twice! 

Now you can change the background of your painting super easily with the new background change button! If you are not painting on a picture, just tap the button and the background will change to something else, allowing your creativity to run wild! 

What’s Inside:
- 20+ vibrant colors
- A magic brush tool
- Multiple brush sizes
- Area fill bucket
- Color choice pallet
- Multi-Touch finger coloring which enables a unique painting experience
- Save your drawing to the camera roll! 
- 230+ vivid coloring pages, in 11 categories
 
+ + Coloring Pages Categories + +
- Animals
- Dinosaurs
- Princesses
- Butterflies and Flowers
- Cars
- Sea
- Letters
- Christmas
- Monsters
- Dolls and Teddy Bears
- Toys

Note: The first coloring page of each category and the first three coloring utensils are completely free. Many more coloring pages and coloring utensils are available in an easy to use in-app purchase inside the application.

ABOUT TabTale 
With over 350 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. We lovingly produce interactive e-books, games, and educational experiences for children.
Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ 
Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTale
Follow us:@Tabtale
Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/iTabtale

CONTACT US 
Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at: WeCare@tabtale.com

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTS:
* This App is free to play but certain in-game items may be purchased for real money. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.
* By downloading this App you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at: http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at: http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/.
Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
trackCensoredName: Paint Sparkles Draw - My First Coloring Book HD!
trackName: Paint Sparkles Draw - My First Coloring Book HD!
releaseNotes:
> Take a picture! Make your creation truly yours by taking a picture with it or use your picture as a new background for your creative flow! 
> Shake to Paint - Shake your device and see paint-filled fireworks rocket off and blast paint wherever they land!  
> Now you can switch backgrounds! And it’s easy too! 
> Quick access to the camera roll!
